article_title: ObamaCare, Doctor Shortage To Spur $2 Billion Telehealth Market

article_metadata.description: The business of treating patients via telehealth in the U.S. will dramatically increase to nearly $2 billion in revenue within five years due to a confluence of events in the health care industry from doctor shortages to provider payment changes under the Affordable Care Act.
